questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Information Technology industry and highlight key achievements or projects you have worked on during your 6.3 years of experience?
Could you elaborate on the reasons for the 1.5-year employment gap due to personal reasons? How did you stay up-to-date with industry trends during this time?
How do you ensure that your technical skills remain current and relevant in the fast-paced IT industry?
Can you discuss a challenging situation you faced in your previous roles and how you successfully resolved it?
How do you prioritize and manage multiple tasks or projects effectively in your work?
What motivated you to pursue a career in Information Technology, and how do you stay passionate about the field?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting complex technical issues in your work?
Can you provide an example of a time when you had to collaborate with cross-functional teams or stakeholders to achieve a common goal?
How do you stay organized and manage time efficiently to meet project deadlines and deliverables?
How do you handle stress and pressure in high-demand situations, and what strategies do you use to maintain a healthy work-life balance?
